title: Partial SSN exposed through Presentation slides on ██████████
content:
Summary:
During a search of ████████ I discovered that one of the slides ina presentation contained a screen shot of live data.
Description:
The slides describe testing and using military application to organize and aggregate data on users. On one of the slides it does show a screen shot of actual data. I'm assuming it's live due to the fact that part of it was blocked out like the previous report where it showed XXXX and 4 digits.
## Impact
Critical
## Step-by-step Reproduction Instructions
████
## Product, Version, and Configuration (If applicable)
N/A
## Suggested Mitigation/Remediation Actions
Purge the file
Impact
Last 4 digits of an SSN can be used on various web portals along with knowing the full name of the soldier can give us access to sensitive portals
steps: Search through ████████ for presentation slides containing screenshots of live data.
Identify a slide that shows a screenshot with partially redacted SSN (last 4 digits visible).
vuln_description: A presentation slide contains a screenshot of live data, exposing the last 4 digits of a soldier's SSN, which could be used to gain unauthorized access to sensitive portals when combined with the soldier's full name.
reason: The vulnerability involves identifying a slide with sensitive data in a presentation, which is a straightforward task once the presentation is accessed. There are no complex interactions or multiple components involved in discovering this vulnerability.
